data.pageDescription: Michel Murabito talk's: Platform Engineering: DevX nel paese delle meraviglie
data.children: With the goal of constantly improving the developer experience and increasing the productivity of development teams, Platform Engineering creates toolchains and workflows that enable self-service capabilities, reducing complexity and uncertainty in the software development and deployment phases. Together with Michel Murabito, we will explore the key concepts of Platform Engineering, its benefits, and how

schema.name: DevMy on YouTube 2024
schema.description: At DevMy on YouTube 2024, Michel Murabito delivered an insightful talk on Platform Engineering: DevX nel paese delle meraviglie
